title: ABOUT CPS LIMITED
content: CPS Ltd. is owned and managed by the US company Think Bricks LLC DBA Cyberpcsales (CPS). We are a modern distribution company focused on the computer and gaming industries. CPS Ltd. started our journey in Bangladesh in the year 2022. In this short amount of time, we built a stellar reputation with hundreds of retail, wholesale, and local partners by providing excellent customer service. CPS Ltd. is moving forward with a vision to become the largest computer distribution company in Bangladesh by 2027.
